divs: Sighting DetailsThe day after Steven Hawkins made his announcement or the warning on the assistance of er's I've been seeing them every night at the same time 9:30 pm for about a week now, there's even what appears to be a mother ship. That shows up then disappeares. Today's date is April 30
trends: There have been 116 other sightings in Dallas
